description:
In this course titled ' Hypnosis - Get Rid of Your Skin Problems Now.' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

  • Types of skin problems
  • Consequences of skin problems
  • Reasons of skin problems
  • How hypnosis can help you heal your skin problems with the powerful techniques of self hypnosis, visualization and affirmations
You will be able to reduce and heal your skin problems instantly using powerful imagery , self hypnosis , positive visualizations and affirmations.

You will be able to reduce stress, sleep problems, depression and negative thinking using powerful affirmations which is given as a bonus along with the lecture .

This course is very useful for those are mentally and physically suffering from the affects of skin problems.

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 10 lectures in English.

It is ideal for everyone who want to heal their skin problems

This course contains-

Lecture1:Introduction

Lecture2:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture3:Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture4:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture5:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture6:Visualization Exercise : Rules To Be Followed

Lecture7:Visualization Exercise: Heal Your Skin Problems Easily

oLecture8:Summary

oLecture9:Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity

Lecture 10: Bonus Exercise - General Healing Audio File
title: Hypnosis - Get Rid of Your Skin Problems Now
